name: Shadow Quest
description:
This game was made during a school project, i used a total of 22 days and about 90 hours of work. It is in very early development!

This game is in very early development, so this is just a combat demo and NOT a full game.

Gameplay:

  •  Movement: Click to move
  • Attack: Left mouse button 1
  • Special Abilities: 1, 2, and right mouse button
